QuestData.Title: Rocs vs Eagles
QuestData.Description: High Crawliac has taught her witches how to curse our beloved eagles into the vile rocs you see assaulting the valley.$b$bThere is no way to break this curse once it has taken hold.$b$bWe will take to the skies and do battle with the rocs, but we need your help on the ground.$b$bHead north through Darkfeather Valley and release any eagles that you find.$b$bEvery eagle you save is one less roc we must kill later.
QuestData.RewardText: Your bravery has returned to us some of our fine feathered friends. Well done.$b$bNow how do you feel about a frontal assault?
